title: WORLD SERIES 2009 FONT?
content:
I feel like this one should be easy-- but I can't figure it out:

[http://www.logoshak.com/~asgsport/images7/2009\_World\_Series\_6.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110211160951/http:/www.logoshak.com/~asgsport/images7/2009_World_Series_6.jpg "http://www.logoshak.com/~asgsport/images7/2009\_World\_Series\_6.jpg")
author: absolutejean

comments.content:
Is it a modified Kabel?

--  
Jean Ly  
Quantum Signs & Graphics

I'm afraid you were misled by the W.  
No, Kabel has slanted line ends throughout. We need something to fit the R and the S and that leads us to Futura. The W is made of two Vs. Medium or semibold weight to get a pointed V.  
Maybe the R was altered a little. This is a logo after all and not just a paper headline.

PS: the figures are Copperplate Gothic

Thanks Fontgrube.  
--  
Jean Ly  
Quantum Signs & Graphics
